actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Ways and Means

official_title: A bill to amend the Trade Act of 1974 to provide that articles which are considered for, but fail to receive, designation as articles eligible for duty-free treatment under the generalized system of preferences may not be reconsidered for such designation for a period of 5 years.

summary.text: Amends the Trade Act of 1974 to provide that articles which are proposed for but fail to be granted duty-free treatment may not be reconsidered for such treatment for five years.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Trade Act of 1974 to provide that articles which are considered for, but fail to receive, designation as articles eligible for duty-free treatment under the generalized system of preferences may not be reconsidered for such designation for a period of 5 years.
